name: The Warrior Test
description:
Lore:

You are a warrior and you have to pass the test to rank up in your clan, this test consists of escaping from the world in which your leaders have put you and for that you have to take all the orbs from the secondary towers and take them to the tower main in the shortest time possible, while facing enemies

Controls:

Movement: W,A,S,D

Basic sword attack: Left mouse button

Mana sword attack: Left mouse button and E

Mana attack: Left mouse button and Q

Jump: Space

Flip gravity: F

Content downloaded or made before jam:

Sounds from freesounds.com

Animations from mixamo.com

User interface from Kenney.com

Cel shading material
